sentences.sentence: The menu features roast meats and poultry.
sentences.translation: 菜单以各种烤肉和家禽肉为特色。

sentences.sentence: Contaminants found in poultry will also be found in their eggs.
sentences.translation: 在家禽里发现的污染物，也将会在它们下的蛋里发现。

sentences.sentence: Farmers often give penicillin to beef and poultry, and because of this, penicillin has been found in the milk of treated cows.
sentences.translation: 农民经常给牛肉和家禽注射青霉素，因此这些被注射过的奶牛的奶中含有青霉素。
